name: European Association Notified Bodies Medical Devices
goal:
The Association, which is devoid of any profit motive, has, as its objective :
to represent the European Notified Bodies for Medical Devices in their dealings with the European Commission, with representative associations of the medical devices industry and with the media, the establishment of a code of ethics and to make any useful information available.
The principal objective of the Association being thus defined, the Association may carry out any activities related directly or indirectly to its objective.
It can, in particular, contribute to and take an interest in any activity similar to its objective.
The Association may take, as tenant or owner, any buildings necessary to the pursuance of its objective.
In support of the achievement of its objective, it may receive any gift by hand, subsidy, donation or legacy made to it by any person or organisation provided it be approved by the Administrative Committee and in accordance with the law.
euInitiatives: Medical devices regulations, through participation to meetings and working groups on the elaboration of guidelines and the European database
